name: The Conflux Story
description:
The Conflux Story is a pixelated, atmospheric adventure game about a love triangle, a lost guitar, and the daring sewer expedition that recovered the latter and shattered the former.

Programming

Chasing Syzygies

Creature and character animations

Quepieces

Music

Dan Drebing

Get the Soundtrack!

You can trade your cash for tunes over at the OST's Bandcamp page.

Regarding PC Specs

The Conflux Story is not a resource-greedy game at all. While the lighting engine may cause lag on older computers, any reasonably up-to-date machine should run it without major issues.

Contact

If you have questions or comments or whatever, you're more than welcome to contact me here or on Twitter! You can also reach out to the fantastic artists I collaborated with on this project using the links in the credits above.
